thread.section_title: PhotonLight.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PhotonLight.com | www.photonlight.com
thread.title: Amy Kelly

author: Amy Kelly
title: Amy Kelly
text: The T2 was a birthday gift for my husband. He's an auto mechanic and had broken his current flashlight. He loves it and says it's very bright and a great size to carry around in his pocket. The price and speed of delivery on this website was better than anywhere else online. I received it fast and was pleasantly surprised that it came in a nice little box. Great warranty too!
